label: About Me
note: I am a multi-disciplinary technologist with 6 years of IT experience, 3 years commercial, complemented by academic degrees in physics and computer science from elite academic institutions. Excited to be on the hunt for a long term employment position.

label: Full Stack .NET Software Engineer
description: Bolstered core ETL functionality with optimisations in NHibernate, Entity and REST-driven data pipeline. Developed NUnit integration tests and integrated them into TeamCity CI/CD pipeline.

label: Data Scientist
description: Developed and maintained insurance risk models in Python, leveraging pandas, NumPy, and SQL to process large financial datasets. Built tools for projecting bond yield curves and stock prices. Automated our Bloomberg data retrieval pipeline. Acted as a primary point of contact for Moody’s, supervising the deployment and functioning of financial simulators.

label: Data Analyst
description: Applied process mining techniques to large-scale banking event log data, using Python, SQL, and data visualisation tools to identify systemic bottlenecks in internal and user-facing processes. Presented findings to other teams, and collaborated on devising and implementing solutions.
